name: Twin Towers "A"
additionalNotes:
This is a special edition of the Opus X "A" cigar, released in October 2001 to raise money for victims of 9/11 -- only 1,000 of them were ever made.

The cellophane says "New York New York City of Heroes", and the coffin is hand-signed by Carlito Fuente to say "God Bless America, Carlito Fuente." 

- Vitolas.net
